```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(pander)
panderOptions("table.split.table", Inf)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

### Data

```{r, xlsx}
library(xlsx)
options(width = 180)
BFI <- read.xlsx("../data/BFI.xlsx", sheetIndex = 1, startRow = 3, endRow = 161, colIndex = c(4:5, 10:21), header = FALSE)
names(BFI) <- c("ID", "Name", "E1", "A1", "O1", "C1", "N1", "E2", "A2", "O2", "C2", "N2", "O3", "A3")
pander(BFI)
MI <- read.xlsx("../data/MI.xlsx", sheetIndex = 1, startRow = 3, endRow = 161, colIndex = c(4, 10:65), header = FALSE)
names(MI)[1] <- "ID"
pander(MI[, 1:29])
pander(MI[, c(1, 30:57)])
class.roll <- BFI[, 1:2]
```

### Save Data

```{r, save.image}
save.image("./BFI_MI_1701.RData")
```
